description: Safer, faster, more direct journeys into and across London

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Cycle Superhighways aim to provide protected space for cycling on some of London's busiest roads. They connect stations, town centres and key destinations, making them more accessible and easier for people to cycle to."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
From summer, we're combining new cycle routes, Cycle Superhighways and Quietways into one cycle network called Cycleways.
We currently have eight Cycle Superhighway routes completed.
